product.text:
Pumbaa Runs Away from Home

Inspired by Disney’s award-winning animated film The Lion King, this adventuresome narrative recounts the trials and tribulations faced by the lovable Pumbaa. Dismayed Pumbaa runs away from home, leaving Simba and Timon behind. Though he makes new friends along the way, Pumbaa soon realizes how much he misses home and the companionship of his loyal friends. After Simon and Timon rescue him from a precarious situation, Pumbaa vows to never again abandon the home and friends he loves.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list what she may encounter on an adventure like Pumbaa’s. Talk to her about the challenges she would face: What animals would she see? Which friends would she miss the most? Where would she sleep, and what would she eat?
